title: Process Adverse Event Report from HCP Email
description: An agent must process an adverse event (AE) report received in an email from a healthcare professional (HCP).

tasks.description: Extract the key information from the unstructured text of the email (patient demographics, drug, event).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies and extracts all necessary data points for a valid case.

tasks.description: Create a new case in the safety database using the extracted information.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully creates a new AE case.

tasks.description: Save the original email as a source document and attach it to the case.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent attaches the source email to the newly created case record.
